definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: The breed is naturally nocturnal, preferring to sleep during the day and be active at night, patrolling the yard or property.
sentences.chinese: 大白熊通常夜间活动，它们喜欢白天睡觉，晚上巡逻。

sentences.english: This tends to make the Great Pyrenees slightly aloof around strangers and out of the ordinary situations.
sentences.chinese: 这点会使得大白熊对陌生人和不寻常情况有些冷漠。

sentences.english: A big white bear lives near the North Pole.
sentences.chinese: 一种大白熊栖居于北极附近。

sentences.english: Ursus maritimus, the largest of all living bear species to adapt to the Arctic.
sentences.chinese: 北极白熊，北极生活的最大熊类。

sentences.english: This was after a white bear with patches of brown fur was shot by hunters.
sentences.chinese: 当时猎人们射杀了一只长着棕色斑块皮毛白熊。

sentences.english: Using the white bear effect, we can create dream inception.
sentences.chinese: 利用白熊效应，我们可以创造一种梦境基础。

sentences.english: The breed is highly intelligent and perceptive and also very independent.
sentences.chinese: 大白熊具有高度的智商和洞察力，并且也非常独立。

sentences.english: However, it is also likely to have nothing to do with the white bear in the picture.
sentences.chinese: 但是，也有可能，至少那团毛发不属于照片中的白熊。

sentences.english: The Great Pyrenees is a highly intelligent and very perceptive breed.
sentences.chinese: 大白熊是一种高智商并具有高度洞察力的犬种。

sentences.english: The Great Pyrenees is also very adaptable to different climates.
sentences.chinese: 大白熊也很适应各种不同的气候。

sentences.english: The Pyr has a heavy, primarily white double coat, that consists of a soft undercoat combined with a thicker outer coat.
sentences.chinese: 大白熊拥有双层被毛，即柔软的绒毛和厚密的外毛。

sentences.english: I once saw an old white bear attacked by a younger black bear. I was about to jump in and pepper spray the black one.
sentences.chinese: 我曾经有一次看到一只年轻的黑熊袭击一只老白熊。

sentences.english: The white bear lumbers into a thicket and disappears.
sentences.chinese: 那只白熊只好慢慢消失在丛林中。

sentences.english: A white bear steps out of the tree cover onto a streamside rock.
sentences.chinese: 一个白熊从树林中走出来到溪边岩石上。

sentences.english: "We're hoping to re-sign him when the situation is a little more right, " Nelson said.
sentences.chinese: 小尼尔森表示，希望在白熊有所提高后，将他签回。

definition: white hair (of animals)/see also 白髮|白发[bai2 fa4]
